> Dark One raised his plasma rifle, firing off three plasma bolts at
Stronghold.

Stronghold took the shots easily, not yet hurt from battle. He and Blender
both fired rapidly (RAPIDLY) 17 shots each at Dark One.

> Breakdown raised his grenade launcher, firing off a grenade set to explode
on
> impact at the Mafia base.

(All of the attackers of the base's damage that KSLawdogg caused will be
posted here.)

The base disappeares in a puff of smoke, when the smoke clears, it's clear
that the base's shields are gone, there is a hole in the side.

> Pyro raised his flame cannon, firing off three fireballs at Blender.

Blender is struck and yells in rage, putting out a firey arm.

"It's time to knuckle up!" Blender says.

> Hiss raised his fusion cannon, firing off three blasts at Doom Ice.

(Doom Ice is inside of the base, now)


> Demon Wulf growled in anger as Rizopas took the shots heroically.  Raising
> his sword, it fired a green bolt of energy out at Rizopas.

Rizopas was hit, and he rolled down into the pit made in an attempt to rest
for a minute.

> Flesh Ripper got up, firing off three optic blasts at > Unitron barely
felt the laser blast as it dug into his turret.  Transforming
> to robot mode, he raised both rifles.  He fired off three bolts of energy
> from each, six laser bolts heading out at Rizopas.  "We shall celebrate
our
> victory when the river of mech-fluid from you and your companions flows at
> our feet!"

Rizopas barely avoided them when he fell into the pit.

"It already is." He said from the pit. There was mech fluid all over the
ground, however, most of it was from a few bots.
